email_text:
Subject: Important Notice: Loan Forgiveness Program for Department of Education Loans

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you about an exclusive opportunity for loan forgiveness through the Department of Education. As part of our ongoing effort to assist borrowers in managing their student loan debt, we are pleased to offer you the chance to have a portion of your loans forgiven through our special forgiveness program.

This program is specifically designed for borrowers who have Department of Education loans and meet certain eligibility requirements. By participating in this program, you can potentially have thousands of dollars of your student loan debt wiped clean, providing you with much-needed financial relief.

To take advantage of this opportunity, all you need to do is click on the link below and complete the online application form. Once your application has been submitted, our team will review your information and determine your eligibility for loan forgiveness.

[Phishing Link]

Please note that this offer is only available for a limited time, so we urge you to act quickly to secure your spot in the program. Don't miss out on this chance to finally be free from the burden of student loan debt.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at [Fake Contact Information]. Our dedicated team of specialists is here to help you every step of the way.

Thank you for being a valued borrower with the Department of Education. We look forward to helping you achieve financial freedom through our loan forgiveness program.

Sincerely,

Department of Education Loan Forgiveness Team
